name: open_in_browser
description:
Open one or more URLs or local files in a web browser. Supports both system default and specific browsers. For local files, automatically converts paths to file:// URLs. Important notes:

1. URL Support:
   * Web URLs (http://, https://)
   * Local file paths (converted to file:// URLs)
   * Direct file:// URLs

2. Browser Selection:
   * Uses system default browser when unspecified
   * Supports common browsers (chrome, firefox, edge, safari)
   * Allows custom browser names

3. Batch Operations:
   * Open up to 6 URLs at once
   * Mix of web URLs and local files
   * Reports success/failure per URL

4. Security:
   * Local files must be within project root
   * Validates URLs and file paths
   * Reports detailed error messages
author: BB Team
